document.full_text: the departments of agriculture and energy announce that up to $30 million will go toward research and development in advanced biofuels, bioenergy and "high-value bio-based products" over the next three to four years.
document.title: u.s. expands seeding of biomass
lines_and_colors: the departments of agriculture and energy announce that up to $30 million will go toward research and development in advanced biofuels, bioenergy and "high-value bio-based products" over the next three to four years.
